data.oai_dc:dc: Entiminae is the largest subfamily of weevils, small to medium sized phyllophagous weevils with deciduous mandibular process and mostly root-feeding larva. The checklist was generated from the 3i database which provides information on all species, including, distributional and host plant data, and literature references. 3i (Internet-accessible Interactive Identification) is a set of software tools for creating on-line identification keys, taxonomic databases, and virtual taxonomic revisions.
